amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike title III which deals with the adoption of Indian children and Indian child custody proceedings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike title II of the bill, which would amend the child custody proceeding provisions of the Indian Child Welfare Act of 1978.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Young (AK) amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 195 - 212 (Roll no. 164).
